page.title: 04Long Sandall-a dying village
page.content: The present residents of the Manor House,{Long Sandall,}have lived there since{1949,}when it was a quiet, peaceful village. The cottages were well cared for, and barges stopped on the{canal}to use the shop. Over the last 25 years industry has moved closer so that now the council say that the houses are too close to the factories.{In the 1970s}the council proposed to demolish houses, but people did not want to move and signed a petition asking the council to pre- serve the village. The petition failed and most of the inhabitants moved. A local man is interested in converting the old barns into craft workshops with flats above. If this does not happen, Long Sandall may remain a village that has returned to a population similar to that of{1086.}
